5C71535A.VoiceDir13.BCB66: Shocked. Protesting the size of the reward Naglaa (Nah-zh-lah) gives the Player.

727D884B.Line11.EDC70: Bless Akarat's holy name! He sent you to save us. Take this with our blessing.

A6667B4F.Line15.EDC70: May it help you on your path.

C2B3B418.VoiceDir11.EDC70: Awash in relief. Reverence. Eager to repay the Player. Akarat (Ah-kah-raht)

F69CA71C.VoiceDir15.EDC70: To Player. Smiling. Sincere. Closing Player's hand around a sizeable bag of gold.
